text: goaga seongnyeon-i doel ttaekkaji goaui jaesan-e gakkai haji malla geuui bogjileul wihan geos-eun je-oela chisuwa mugeleul gongpyeonghage hala nu guegedo hananim-eun mugeoun jim-eul juji anihago geuga hal su issneun jim-eul jusinola neohuiga mal-eul hal ttaeneun jeongjighage malhala gajang gakkaun chincheog-ilado geuleohanila geuligo hananimgwaui seong-yag-eul jikila geugeos-i hananimkkeseo neohuiege myeonglyeonghayeo gieoghadolog han geos-inila
